report.title: HORUS summary
report.description: Summary view of a sample for HORUS.
report.query:
drop table if exists sample_taxa_list; drop table if exists bmwp_data; drop table if exists bmwp_sums; select distinct cttl.id, cttl.taxon_meaning_id, cttl.preferred_taxa_taxon_list_id into temporary sample_taxa_list from cache_taxa_taxon_lists cttl #joins# where cttl.preferred=true; select distinct bmwp.higher_taxon_meaning_id, bmwp.original_score, bmwp.revised_score into temporary bmwp_data from pantheon.bmwp_scores bmwp join cache_taxon_paths ctp on bmwp.higher_taxon_meaning_id=any(ctp.path) join sample_taxa_list tl on tl.taxon_meaning_id=ctp.taxon_meaning_id; select sum(original_score) as sum_original_score, sum(revised_score) as sum_revised_score into temporary bmwp_sums from bmwp_data; select 1 as sort, 'Number of species' as property, count(distinct tl.preferred_taxa_taxon_list_id)::varchar as value from sample_taxa_list tl union select 2, 'Number of species with habitat scores', count(distinct tl.preferred_taxa_taxon_list_id)::varchar from sample_taxa_list tl join taxa_taxon_list_attribute_values ttlav on ttlav.taxa_taxon_list_id=tl.preferred_taxa_taxon_list_id and ttlav.deleted=false join taxa_taxon_list_attributes ttla on ttla.id=ttlav.taxa_taxon_list_attribute_id and ttlav.deleted=false and (ttla.caption='rarity score' or ttla.description='Pantheon quality indices') union select 3, 'Rarity score (SQI)', round(avg(rscv.int_value)*100)::varchar as sqi from (select distinct tl.preferred_taxa_taxon_list_id from sample_taxa_list tl) as sub join taxa_taxon_list_attribute_values rscv on rscv.taxa_taxon_list_id=sub.preferred_taxa_taxon_list_id and rscv.deleted=false and rscv.taxa_taxon_list_attribute_id=#rarity_score_attr_id# union select 4, '

Conservation statuses

', '
' union select 5, case term when 'GB Status' then 'GB Conservation Status (old & new)' else term end, array_to_string(array_agg( '' || count::varchar || ' ' || code || '' ), '; ') from ( select cat.term, coalesce(td.code, td.abbreviation) as code, count(distinct tl.preferred_taxa_taxon_list_id) from taxon_designations td join taxa_taxon_designations ttd on ttd.taxon_designation_id=td.id and ttd.deleted=false join taxa_taxon_lists ttl on ttl.taxon_id=ttd.taxon_id and ttl.deleted=false join sample_taxa_list tl on tl.id=ttl.id join cache_termlists_terms cat on cat.id=td.category_id where td.deleted=false and ttl.taxon_list_id=#taxon_list_id# and coalesce(td.code, td.abbreviation) <> 'None' group by cat.term, td.code, td.abbreviation ) as subtable group by term union select 6, '

Scores

', '
' union select 7, ttla.caption, case ttla.caption -- should count only native species when 'grazing marsh - status' then round(sum(ttlav.int_value)::numeric / count(distinct tl.preferred_taxa_taxon_list_id), 2)::varchar when 'IEC (older version)' then sum(ttlav.int_value)::varchar when 'IEC' then sum(ttlav.int_value)::varchar when 'peat bog spiders' then count(distinct tl.preferred_taxa_taxon_list_id)::varchar || ' indicator species' else /* Standard output, just a breakdown of counts of each score category */ (select string_agg(value, ', ') from ( select '' || count(distinct tl.preferred_taxa_taxon_list_id)::varchar || ' ' || string_agg(distinct coalesce(sd.value, t.term, avsub.int_value::varchar, avsub.text_value) || '', '|' ) as value from taxa_taxon_list_attribute_values avsub join sample_taxa_list tl on tl.preferred_taxa_taxon_list_id=avsub.taxa_taxon_list_id join taxa_taxon_list_attributes asub on asub.id=avsub.taxa_taxon_list_attribute_id and asub.deleted=false left join cache_termlists_terms t on t.id=avsub.int_value and t.termlist_id=asub.termlist_id left join pantheon.score_details sd on sd.category=asub.caption and sd.key=coalesce(t.term, avsub.int_value::varchar, avsub.text_value) where avsub.deleted=false and avsub.taxa_taxon_list_attribute_id=ttla.id group by asub.id, avsub.int_value, avsub.text_value ) as sub) end as values from taxa_taxon_list_attributes ttla join taxa_taxon_list_attribute_values ttlav on ttlav.taxa_taxon_list_attribute_id=ttla.id and ttlav.deleted=false join sample_taxa_list tl on tl.id=ttlav.taxa_taxon_list_id where ttla.description='Pantheon quality indices' and ttla.deleted=false group by ttla.id, ttla.caption union select 8, 'BMWP', 'Original: ' || sum(bmwp.original_score)::text || '; Revised: ' || sum(bmwp.revised_score)::text from bmwp_data bmwp union select 9, 'CCI', 'Original: ' || round((sum(ttlav.int_value)::numeric /* cs_sum */ / count(distinct tl.preferred_taxa_taxon_list_id) /* sp_count */) * greatest(case when max(ttlav.int_value) >= 10 then 15 when max(ttlav.int_value) = 9 then 12 when max(ttlav.int_value) = 8 then 10 when max(ttlav.int_value) = 7 then 7 when max(ttlav.int_value) in (5, 6) then 5 when max(ttlav.int_value) in (3, 4) then 3 when max(ttlav.int_value) in (1, 2) then 1 else 0 end /* cos */, case when sum_original_score >= 301 then 15 when sum_original_score >= 251 then 12 when sum_original_score >= 201 then 10 when sum_original_score >= 151 then 7 when sum_original_score >= 101 then 5 when sum_original_score>= 51 then 3 when sum_original_score >= 1 then 1 else 0 end), 2)::varchar || '; ' || 'Revised: ' || round((sum(ttlav.int_value)::numeric /* cs_sum */ / count(distinct tl.preferred_taxa_taxon_list_id) /* sp_count */) * greatest(case when max(ttlav.int_value) >= 10 then 15 when max(ttlav.int_value) = 9 then 12 when max(ttlav.int_value) = 8 then 10 when max(ttlav.int_value) = 7 then 7 when max(ttlav.int_value) in (5, 6) then 5 when max(ttlav.int_value) in (3, 4) then 3 when max(ttlav.int_value) in (1, 2) then 1 else 0 end /* cos */, case when sum_revised_score >= 301 then 15 when sum_revised_score >= 251 then 12 when sum_revised_score >= 201 then 10 when sum_revised_score >= 151 then 7 when sum_revised_score >= 101 then 5 when sum_revised_score>= 51 then 3 when sum_revised_score >= 1 then 1 else 0 end), 2)::varchar from bmwp_sums bmwp, taxa_taxon_list_attributes ttla join taxa_taxon_list_attribute_values ttlav on ttlav.taxa_taxon_list_attribute_id=ttla.id and ttlav.deleted=false and ttlav.taxa_taxon_list_attribute_id=189 join sample_taxa_list tl on tl.id=ttlav.taxa_taxon_list_id where ttla.caption='CCI' and ttla.deleted=false group by sum_original_score, sum_revised_score order by sort, property

joins.join: join cache_occurrences_functional o on o.preferred_taxa_taxon_list_id=cttl.preferred_taxa_taxon_list_id join cache_samples_functional s on s.website_id=o.website_id and s.survey_id=o.survey_id and s.id=o.sample_id and s.id in (#sample_id#)

join cache_taxa_taxon_lists cttl2 on cttl2.preferred_taxa_taxon_list_id=cttl.preferred_taxa_taxon_list_id join scratchpad_list_entries sle on sle.entry_id=cttl2.id and sle.scratchpad_list_id in (#sample_id#)
